question: Will Jeff Bezos be ranked 2nd on the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List on March 29, 2025?
reasoning:
Based on the information gathered:

1. As of March 12, 2025, Jeff Bezos is ranked 3rd on the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List with a net worth of $215 billion. Mark Zuckerberg is ranked 2nd, also with a net worth of $215 billion. This indicates that their rankings are very close and could change with slight fluctuations in their net worths.

2. Jeff Bezos's net worth as of March 2025 is $217 billion according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index, which suggests there might be slight discrepancies between different sources, but generally, he is not currently ranked 2nd.

3. The rankings are subject to change due to fluctuations in stock prices and business performances, which can affect the net worth of these billionaires.

Given that Jeff Bezos is currently ranked 3rd and not 2nd, and considering the close competition with Mark Zuckerberg, there is a possibility of a change in rankings by March 29, 2025. However, the current data suggests that he is not in the 2nd position.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.3

---
title: Jeff Bezos net worth 2025: How much is the Amazon founder worth?
author: Vishnu Kaimal
url: https://americanbazaaronline.com/2025/03/18/jeff-bezos-net-worth-2025-how-much-is-the-amazon-founder-worth-460851/
hostname: americanbazaaronline.com
description: Jeff Bezos is an American entrepreneur and the founder of Amazon, one of the world‚Äôs largest e-commerce companies
sitename: The American Bazaar
date: 2025-03-18
categories: ['CEO Corner']
---
Jeff Bezos is an American entrepreneur and the founder of Amazon, one of the world‚Äôs largest e-commerce companies.

According to Bloomberg Billionaires Index, Bezos has a net worth of $217 billion as of March 2025.

Born on January 12, 1964, in Albuquerque, New Mexico, Bezos graduated from Princeton University in 1986 with a degree in electrical engineering and computer science. He worked in various roles in finance and technology before founding Amazon in 1994. Initially an online bookstore, Amazon rapidly expanded into a global e-commerce and technology giant, offering everything from electronics to groceries.

** READ: Jeff Bezos and OpenAI back robot startup Physical Intelligence, valued at $2.4 billion** (November 5, 2024)

Bezos served as Amazon‚Äôs CEO until 2021, when he stepped down to become the company‚Äôs executive chairman. Under his leadership, Amazon revolutionized the retail industry, pioneering innovations like one-click ordering, Amazon Prime, and cloud computing services through Amazon Web Services (AWS).

Bezos is also known for his ventures outside of Amazon. In 2000, he founded Blue Origin, a private aerospace company focused on space exploration. In 2013, he purchased The Washington Post, revitalizing the newspaper with a focus on digital growth.

With a net worth consistently among [the highest in the world](https://americanbazaaronline.com/2024/11/22/top-ten-richest-billionaires-in-the-world-87654/), Bezos has become a symbol of modern entrepreneurship, technology, and innovation. He continues to influence various industries, pushing boundaries in space exploration, media, and commerce.

Bezos manages his personal investments through Bezos Expeditions, a family office overseeing a diverse portfolio across various sectors. Notable [investments](https://bezosexpeditions.com/) include Airbnb, Anduril, and Arrived, a real estate platform simplifying rental property investments.

Additionally, the Bezos Earth Fund, [launched](https://www.bezosearthfund.org/?utm_source=chatgpt.com) in 2020 wi‚Ä¶

These billionaires can, however, still borrow against that wealth to avoid selling stock, deferring (or eliminating for heirs) taxes on unrealized capital gains in the process. messages.content:
Based on the following question, analyze it carefully and provide your probability estimate.

Question: Will Jeff Bezos be ranked 2nd on the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List on March 29, 2025?
Background: The Economic Times: [What Makes the World's Billionaire Rankings Change So Often?](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/india/what-makes-the-worlds-billionaire-rankings-change-so-often/articleshow/114215970.cms)
Resolution criteria: This question resolves as YES if Jeff Bezos is ranked #2 according to the [Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/#482980403d78) on March 29, 2025, and NO otherwise.
Fine print: If there is a tie for second place, the question will be annulled. If there is a change to a name, for example if '& family' is added or removed from the name, it will still count as the same person/entity.
present_date: 2025-03-21T22:22:30.370661


Make sure to use the tools at your disposal to gather relevant information before providing your final probability estimate.

You may reason through the problem, but you MUST end your response with:
FINAL PROBABILITY: [your decimal number between 0 and 1]

If there is a change to a name, for example if '& family' is added or removed from the name, it will still count as the same person/entity.","present_date":"2025-03-21T22:22:30.370661","max_queries":5}

messages.content:
{"url": "https://americanbazaaronline.com/2025/03/18/jeff-bezos-net-worth-2025-how-much-is-the-amazon-founder-worth-460851/", "snippet": "---
title: Jeff Bezos net worth 2025: How much is the Amazon founder worth?
author: Vishnu Kaimal
url: https://americanbazaaronline.com/2025/03/18/jeff-bezos-net-worth-2025-how-much-is-the-amazon-founder-worth-460851/
hostname: americanbazaaronline.com
description: Jeff Bezos is an American entrepreneur and the founder of Amazon, one of the world’s largest e-commerce companies
sitename: The American Bazaar
date: 2025-03-18
categories: ['CEO Corner']
---
Jeff Bezos is an American entrepreneur and the founder of Amazon, one of the world’s largest e-commerce companies.

According to Bloomberg Billionaires Index, Bezos has a net worth of $217 billion as of March 2025.

Born on January 12, 1964, in Albuquerque, New Mexico, Bezos graduated from Princeton University in 1986 with a degree in electrical engineering and computer science. He worked in various roles in finance and technology before founding Amazon in 1994. Initially an online bookstore, Amazon rapidly expanded into a global e-commerce and technology giant, offering everything from electronics to groceries.

** READ: Jeff Bezos and OpenAI back robot startup Physical Intelligence, valued at $2.4 billion** (November 5, 2024)

Bezos served as Amazon’s CEO until 2021, when he stepped down to become the company’s executive chairman. Under his leadership, Amazon revolutionized the retail industry, pioneering innovations like one-click ordering, Amazon Prime, and cloud computing services through Amazon Web Services (AWS).

Bezos is also known for his ventures outside of Amazon. In 2000, he founded Blue Origin, a private aerospace company focused on space exploration. In 2013, he purchased The Washington Post, revitalizing the newspaper with a focus on digital growth.

With a net worth consistently among [the highest in the world](https://americanbazaaronline.com/2024/11/22/top-ten-richest-billionaires-in-the-world-87654/), Bezos has become a symbol of modern entrepreneurship, technology, and innovation. He continues to influence various industries, pushing boundaries in space exploration, media, and commerce.

Bezos manages his personal investments through Bezos Expeditions, a family office overseeing a diverse portfolio across various sectors. Notable [investments](https://bezosexpeditions.com/) include Airbnb, Anduril, and Arrived, a real estate platform simplifying rental property investments.

Additionally, the Bezos Earth Fund, [launched](https://www.bezosearthfund.org/?utm_source=chatgpt.com) in 2020 wi…

{"url": "https://beinsure.com/world-richest-people/", "snippet": "---
title: Richest Man in the World 2025 ⭐ Billionaires List [March]
author: Beinsure
url: https://beinsure.com/world-richest-people/
hostname: beinsure.com
description: TOP 50 World's Richest People 2025 ⭐ Forbes' billionaires list in March. Billionaires play an outsized role in shaping the global economy, politics, philanthropy
sitename: Beinsure - Insurance, Reinsurance, InsurTech Insights
date: 2023-06-02
categories: ['Investing', 'Money']
---
The world’s Richest People in 2025 — the number of billionaires in the world 2.850+ individuals — represent almost $15 trln in wealth. The global billionaire population continued to grow in 2025, increasing by 7%. [Beinsure Media](https://beinsure.com/) has collected the data and presents a ranking of the world’s richest people as March 2025.

[Forbes](https://www.forbes.com/)Billionaires Index

The individuals on this list belong to an even more exclusive club and wield still more power. Many are founders of technology giants, with much of their wealth still invested in the companies they started.

Billionaires play an outsized role in shaping the [global economy](https://beinsure.com/global-economy-outlook-2075/), politics, and philanthropy. Details about the calculations are provided in the net worth analysis on each billionaire’s profile page.

Most people have a pretty good idea, even if they’re not an entrepreneur or interested in the subject at all, for that matter.


These billionaires can, however, still borrow against that wealth to avoid selling stock, deferring (or eliminating for heirs) taxes on unrealized capital gains in the process. Multi-billionaires can also take advantage of a panoply of tax deductions to offset reported income, leaving some on this list paying no income tax in recent years.

### 10 Richest People in the World in 2025

**TOP 50 World’s Richest People 2025**

| 11 | Bill Gates | $107B | Microsoft |
| 12 | Michael Bloomberg | $105B | Bloomberg LP |
| 13 | Rob Walton | $104B | Walmart |
| 14 | Jim Walton | $103B | Walmart |
| 15 | Jensen Huang | $101B | Nvidia |
| 16 | Michael…

messages.content:
Based on the information gathered:

1. As of March 12, 2025, Jeff Bezos is ranked 3rd on the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List with a net worth of $215 billion. Mark Zuckerberg is ranked 2nd, also with a net worth of $215 billion. This indicates that their rankings are very close and could change with slight fluctuations in their net worths.

2. Jeff Bezos's net worth as of March 2025 is $217 billion according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index, which suggests there might be slight discrepancies between different sources, but generally, he is not currently ranked 2nd.

3. The rankings are subject to change due to fluctuations in stock prices and business performances, which can affect the net worth of these billionaires.

Given that Jeff Bezos is currently ranked 3rd and not 2nd, and considering the close competition with Mark Zuckerberg, there is a possibility of a change in rankings by March 29, 2025. However, the current data suggests that he is not in the 2nd position.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.3
